text: Alliance members give unique bonuses and provide a limit amount of their unique units for recruitment.
[[b]]Web of Diplomacy[[/b]] can be increased by alliance members and Meeting Halls.
[[b]]Web of Diplomacy[[/b]] can be decreased by purchasing effects.
• Can forge alliances from the start
• Each member of your alliance provides a bonus
• Members of alliance allows for their unique units to be recruited
• Able to purchase faction-wide effects for armies
